nodes.bodyText: We can get by now without skipping all ITs and it will pass since we are using a settings file in right location. 👍
This should be fine. At one point we considered splitting core and itests into separate stages so that we could track stability between the set of tests a little easier.

Oh thanks for pointing that out. I copied these changes from master, where the stages are separate. But that must have been changed after the 2.26.x branch was made, because they're all run in one step here.
I'll need to correct this since $ITCORE isn't even defined in this Jenkinsfile
Oh yeah good call. I totally missed it wasn't defined here, but we would have figured that out fast :-)
